title: Comment from National Security Leaders for America

analysis.key_quote: I believe it will have a chilling effect on the federal workforce and lead to the departure of our most experienced and dedicated employees, while also negatively impacting recruiting and hiring of new workers that the U.S. Government needs to effectively function.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about due process, politicization of the workforce, and the potential loss of experienced employees, which aligns with the indicators for opposition.
